<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77665</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>91fffeab-21b5-11d8-89de-f2e57024db35#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A buddhizmus vándorútja</string>
            <string language="en">The wandering of Buddhism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wandering von Buddhismus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Errer du bouddhisme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vaguear do buddhism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il vagabondaggio del buddhism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιπλάνηση του βουδισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El vagar del buddhism</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A buddhizmus irányzatai, változatai, meggyökeresedése Ázsia különböző területein</string>
            <string language="en">The consolidation of trends, varieties of Buddhism in different areas of Asia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Az Európán kívüli világ,  Buddha,  Gauthama Sziddharta,  mandala,  </string>
            <string language="en">the World outside Europe, Buddha,  Gauthama Sziddharta,  mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Verdichtung der Tendenzen, Vielzahl von 
Buddhismus in den unterschiedlichen Bereichen von Asien</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fusion des tendances, variétés de bouddhisme 
dans différentes régions de l'Asie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A consolidação das tendências, variedades do 
buddhism em áreas diferentes de Ásia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il consolidamento delle tendenze, varietà di 
buddhism nelle regioni differenti dell'Asia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σταθεροποίηση των τάσεων, ποικιλίες του βουδισμού 
στις διαφορετικές περιοχές της Ασίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La consolidación de las tendencias, variedades de
buddhism en diversas áreas de Asia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Weltaußenseite Europa, Buddha, Gauthama Sziddharta,
mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">monde extérieur l'Europe, Bouddha, Gauthama Sziddharta,
mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a parte externa de mundo Europa, Buddha, Gauthama 
Sziddharta, mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la parte esterna di mondo Europa, Buddha, Gauthama 
Sziddharta, mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το παγκόσμιο εξωτερικό Ευρώπη, Βούδας, Gauthama 
Sziddharta, mandala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el exterior de mundo Europa, Buddha, Gauthama 
Sziddharta, mandala</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77665</entry>

    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
